entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:19 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -40.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 03:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -40.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -44.5°C
Wind: SSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 43.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 43. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
